articles.title: Elio Campitelli
articles.contents:
The Scrapbook
          
          
          Home
          About
          
          
          
          
          
          
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
          
            Elio Campitelli
          
          
            
          
          
            When I’m reading a paper I have the (bad) habit of
            spending way too much time trying to reproduce the results
            and tweak the analysis. This is both to check that I
            understood what the authors did and also to check if the
            results are robust.
            So I decided that instead of rotting in my hard-drive,
            I’ll publish these quick-and-dirty analysis here for others
            to see and, hopefully, benefit from. If you find something
            here that you like, feel free to give me a shout-out on
            twitter and/or a citation or two on a published paper.
          
          
            
                
                  
                    Twitter
                  
                
              
                            
                
                  
                    GitHub
                  
                
              
                            
                
                  
                    Código R
